title: Cellar Door (minicast) - 19 July 2010
description:
The Most Beautiful Words in the English Language: "Cellar Door"?It's been said that the most beautiful combination of words in English is "cellar door." But why? By the way, after this caller raised the question, Grant did even more digging on the topic. The result: He wrote a whole article about it that appeared in The New York Times. http://nyti.ms/bkqwpg--A Way with Words is funded by its listeners: http://waywordradio.org/donateGet your language question answered on the air! content:encoded:
The Most Beautiful Words in the English Language: "Cellar Door"?

It's been said that the most beautiful combination of words in English is "cellar door." But why?

By the way, after this caller raised the question, Grant did even more digging on the topic. The result: He wrote a whole article about it that appeared in The New York Times.

http://nyti.ms/bkqwpg

--
